properties.name: Feature: Coins Weight
properties.author: bmos (Wil Thieme)
properties.description: This extension changes coin weight tracking by making an inventory item rather than just including it in the total carried weight.

announcement.text: https://www.fantasygrounds.com/forums/showthread.php?67228-CoreRPG-Coins-Weight\rCoin Weight v2.0:\rCalculates coin weight by leveraging the existing inventory weight process.

base.string: A standard coin weighs about a third of an ounce (50 to the pound).
